title: AI YouTube Summarizer input
description: Configure which YouTube videos to summarize and how the summaries should be generated.

startUrls.title: YouTube URLs
startUrls.description: List of YouTube video, playlist, or channel URLs to summarize.

maxVideos.title: Maximum number of videos
maxVideos.description: Optional hard limit on the total number of videos to process across all URLs.

includeComments.title: Include comments
includeComments.description: If enabled, fetch top comments (requires YOUTUBE_API_KEY) and generate a separate comment summary.

maxCommentsPerVideo.title: Max comments per video
maxCommentsPerVideo.description: Maximum number of top comments to include per video when comments are enabled.

summaryLanguage.title: Summary language
summaryLanguage.description: Language code (e.g. 'en', 'es', 'de') for the main summary.

translationLanguages.title: Additional translation languages
translationLanguages.description: Optional list of extra languages to translate the summary into (currently not used for extra calls, but kept for forward compatibility).

includeFullTranscript.title: Store full transcript
includeFullTranscript.description: If enabled, store the structured transcript of each video as a key-value record instead of only using it for the summary.

modelConfig.title: Model configuration
modelConfig.description: Advanced: override default model and sampling parameters for OpenRouter.

model.title: Model
model.description: OpenRouter model identifier to use for summarization (default: openai/gpt-4o-mini).

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Sampling temperature between 0 and 2; higher values make the output more creative.

maxTokens.title: Max tokens
maxTokens.description: Optional maximum number of tokens for each summary completion.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Optional opaque identifier for the calling system. Stored with each item to help you correlate results.

requestId.title: Request ID
requestId.description: Optional request identifier for tracing individual runs.
